entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: E 29 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
